program-payout.result-success: Successfully sent instructions to FSP's for {{nrSuccessfull}} PA(s).
program-payout.result-failure: Payment request failed for {{nrFailed}} PA(s). Inspect the PA-table below for details.
program-payout.result-waiting: Payment status not yet received for {{nrWaiting}} PA(s). Inspect the PA-table below for the up-to-date status of the payment(s).

program-people-affected.filter-placeholder: Type to filter on any column...

action-inputs.invite-checkbox: Send invitation message to People Affected
action-inputs.invite-explanation: Please compose here the invitation message. Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature (non smart) phone.
action-inputs.reject-checkbox: Send message to rejected People Affected
action-inputs.reject-explanation: Please compose here the message that will be sent. Please ensure to give a reason, and if possible, what their next steps could be. Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature (non smart) phone.
action-inputs.include-checkbox: Send message to included People Affected
action-inputs.include-explanation: Please compose here the message that will be sent. Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature (non smart) phone.

program-people-affected.no-checkboxes: There are currently no People Affected to which this action can be applied.

payment-status-popup.fix-error: Please contact the 121 development team to fix this error. Then use the button below to retry payment for this Person Affected.
payment-status-popup.notes: Note: If the payment failed for all People Affected, you can also use the original 'Start payout now' button again to retry the payment for all People Affected at once.

bulk-import.import-error: Something went wrong with the import. Check the required format of the CSV-file.

import-result.existing: There were {{countExistingPhoneNr}} existing phone-numbers, which are skipped.
import-result.invalid: There were {{countInvalidPhoneNr}} unrecognizable phone numbers. Try to correct them and import again.

bulk-import.timestamp: Latest import has been done on: {{dateTime}}
bulk-import.explanation:
The required format of the CSV-file is: 
phoneNumber,namePartnerOrganization
+0000000000,Example-Name
bulk-import.confirm-message:
Select a CSV-file of the required format.
The system will detect only new phone-numbers and import them as People Affected.

export-list.timestamp: Latest export has been done on: {{dateTime}}
export-list.no-data: There are currently no People Affected to download

all-people-affected.confirm-message: This will download a CSV-file with all People Affected that have started registration.

included.confirm-message: This will download a CSV-file with all included People Affected, to be used for a Community Review.

selected-for-validation.confirm-message: This will download a CSV-file with all People Affected selected for validation, to be used for Validation visits.

payment.confirm-message: This will download a CSV-file with all People Affected included in this payment, to be shared with institutions requiring this data.

unused-vouchers.confirm-message:
This will download a CSV-file with all unused voucher(s).

Note that this action can take a while to complete. Do not leave this page in the meantime.

manage-aidworkers.create-password: Enter a password of at least {{minimalLength}} characters:
manage-aidworkers.succes-create: Succesfully created user with email: '{{email}}' and password '{{password}}'. Please inform them now of their new account by sending an e-mail.

test-payment.confirm: This will test if the provided phonenumbers have a valid M-PESA account. No Person Affected will notice this test.
test-payment.result: Provided phonenumbers have been tested for valid M-PESA accounts. The result can be seen by exporting the Inclusion List.

common.confirm-message-label: The message needs to be longer than {{minLength}} characters.
common.export-error: Something went wrong with the export.
common.unknown-error: Something went wrong. Error is unknown.
